Accountant Job at Adenal Consulting




        
    

        
        Adenal Consulting is a Management and Human Resource Consulting firm that offers business advisory and consulting services to help small and medium-sized enterprises.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Prepare and examine accounting records, financial statements, and other financial reports to assess accuracy, completeness, and conformance to reporting and procedural standards.
	Manage all accounting transactions
	Ensure timely bank payments and monitor bank deposits.
	Handle monthly, quarterly, and annual closings.
	Reconcile accounts payable and receivable.
	Ensure timely submission of tax returns and liaise with external auditors during audits.
	Analyze financial information and summarize financial status.
	Prepare the schedules for statutory remittances (PAYE, WHT, Pension, Company tax, ITF, NSITF, among others) and ensuring timely remittance.
	Maintain a complete and accurate Fixed Asset Register for the company
	Provide technical support and advice on management.
	Participate in financial standards setting and in forecast process.
	Develop and document business processes and accounting policies to maintain and strengthen internal controls.


Requirements


	HND/Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance
	Minimum of 7 years of proven experience as an Accountant in a trading company or related industry.
	Must have ICAN certification
	Thorough knowledge of Accounting procedures and principles.
	Experience with general ledger functions and the month-end/year-end close process.
	Hands-on experience with accounting software packages
	Advanced MS Excel skills including Vlookups and pivot tables.
	Accuracy and attention to detail.
	Aptitude for numbers and quantitative skills.
	Excellent organizational and time-management abilities.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: adenalconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

We are on a mission to provide world-class human resource solutions, using experts while creating value for our shareholders and opportunities in the community. Our vision is to be the most valuable Business Support Solutions Partner to our Clients throughout Africa and beyond.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive
Job Locations: Ibeju Lekki, and Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Credit and Marketing

Job Responsibilities

	Build and maintain a healthy credit portfolio within assigned Area and champion the recovery effort in respect of non- performing credit facilities.
	To review performance of account opened, loan disbursement, collection of due obligations and enforcing stringent controls to prevent PDO (Past Due Obligations).
	Ensure that weekly/monthly activity status and performance reports for the period are prepared for the attention of the Head of Business and Managing Director/ Chief Executive Officer and other relevant Departments.
	Ensure timely review and approval of credit requests in line with the Bank’s Credit Policy
	Formulate business strategies that will attract profitable businesses and periodically engage in group marketing activities within the area of coverage.
	Identify customer/market needs and proactively seek to provide products/services to meet these needs.
	Initiate and participate in area meetings as required and regularly monitoring and evaluate the performance of the Area.
	Maintain existing customer relationships and identify new ones, intervene to resolve sensitive or complex relationship issues to ensure customer satisfaction.
	Monitor the quality of existing credit relationships on a continuous basis.
	Oversee and supervise the relationship management of high net worth accounts.
	And any other responsibilities assign by the Management.


Requirements


	Minimum of First Degree / HND.
	Experience: Minimum of 4 years in a similar role in the MFB Industry.


Skills:


	Ability to identify control techniques to mitigate organizational, supervisory, and business process risks
	Above average IT exposure (good knowledge of excel, word & PowerPoint)
	Credit Analysis & Appraisal Skill
	Good presentation skill
	Microfinance experience is a must
	Knowledge of Banking Operations, Policies and Procedures
	Knowledge of Banking services/products
	Leadership and Mentoring Skill
	Numerical and analytical skill
	Performance driven
	Sociable with good interpersonal skill
	Person should not be more than 45yrs old.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 / month

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: nngwu@icsoutsourcing.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "description": "Federal Polytechnic Ede, Osun State, was established on 14th February, 1992 by the Federal Government as a third generation Polytechnic. As a fast growing institution, it runs forty (40) National Diploma and thirty (30) Higher National Diploma (HND) programmes in four (4) Schools and twenty-one (21) Academic Departments.
